keyEvents.title: Nami Confronts the Crew
keyEvents.description: Nami meets the crew at a paddy field in Cocoyasi Village and tells them to leave.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Stubborn Refusal
keyEvents.description: Luffy lies down in Cocoyasi Village, refusing to leave without Nami.

keyEvents.title: Nojiko Begins the Story
keyEvents.description: Nojiko begins to tell Nami's backstory at her house in Cocoyasi Village.

description: A peaceful village in the East Blue that has been terrorized by Arlong and his Fish-Man Pirates for eight years. Home to Nami and Nojiko.

keyEvents.title: Marine Ship Arrives
keyEvents.description: Commodore Pudding Pudding's fleet arrives to rescue Gosa Village survivors and capture Arlong.

keyEvents.title: Marine Ship Destroyed
keyEvents.description: The ship is sunk by Arlong's officers using an artificial maelstrom.

description: A Marine vessel from the 77th Branch commanded by Commodore Pudding Pudding. The ship was destroyed by Arlong's officers while attempting to rescue Gosa Village survivors.

statusHistory.description: Marine ship arrives at Cocoyasi Village

keyEvents.title: Backstory Revelation Begins
keyEvents.description: Nojiko invites the crew to her house and begins explaining Nami's past.

description: Nojiko's home in Cocoyasi Village where she lives and tends to her mikan orchard. The house serves as the setting for revealing Nami's backstory to the Straw Hat crew.
